name: Faces 2048
description:
Bring the traditional 2048 game to life! Create your own 2048 game with your personal photos and share them with your friends and family.

With Faces 2048 you can:
  • Create personalized 2048 game with your photos and share it with your friends and family.
  • Play with friends and family's collages
  • Pick one of three board sizes: 3x3, 4x4 and even 5x5 board!
  • Share your best score with friends
  • Play with one of our cool built-in collages
